---


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


Loading .csv
```{r}
res <- read.csv("./results.csv")
res$Total.Cost.MWM <- res$Total.Cost.MWM / 10000
res$Total.Cost.AU <- res$Total.Cost.AU / 10000
```


# Data Manipulation
```{r}
res_2_50 <- res[0:49,]
res_51_300 <- res[50:299,]
res_301_1000 <- res[300:999,]
```


# Lineplots for graphs between 2 and 50 vertices per part
```{r}
df <- res_2_50
title_vertices <- " for 2 - 50 vertices"
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(Edge.per.part)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Seconds") +
  geom_line(aes(y = Seconds.MWM, colour = "MWM"), size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = Seconds.AU, colour = "AU"), size=1, alpha=1, linetype=1) +
  scale_colour_manual("", 
                      breaks = c("MWM", "AU"),
                      values = c("cornflowerblue", "red")) +
  ggtitle(paste("MWM & AU execution time", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=Edge.per.part, y=Total.Cost.MWM - Total.Cost.AU)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Difference of Totoal Cost") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method='lm', se=TRUE, color='forestgreen') +
  ggtitle(paste("Difference of Totoal Cost", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=Edge.per.part, y=Iterations.AU)) +
  xlab("Number of Vertices per part") +
  ylab("Iterations") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method='lm', se=TRUE, color='goldenrod') +
  ggtitle(paste("AU iterations", title_vertices)) +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(size=20, hjust = 0.5))
```
